name: European Coffee Federation
goal: The European Coffee Federation represents the coffee industry within the EU. Its members are 13 associations in 12 European countries and 16 companies. ECF is proactive in anticipating potential issues of relevance to the sector, and provides input on issues that affect the coffee industry.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Following EU main initiatives and policies in the following fields DG Sante, DG Agri and DG Trade
